text: Akerley Holmes (January 27, 1894 – November 10, 1946) was a Canadian politician. He served in the Legislative Assembly of New Brunswick as member of the Conservative party representing Northumberland County from 1925 to 1930. ==References== Category:20th-century Canadian politicians Category:1897 births Category:1946 deaths Category:Progressive Conservative Party of New Brunswick MLAs
title: Akerley Holmes
